Who am I ?
My name is Sergey. I'm UI/UX design and front-end development entrepreneur with 4 years of full-time experience under the belt. Originally from Moscow, Russia. Currently living in Vuokatti, Finland
What I do ?
I specialize in user-centered interaction design and responsive web. My goal is to help SME's and startups grow with a use of cutting-edge technologies and best practices.
